data.message:
Nice beard!!!! Totally you Em!! Very hot!  I like clean shaven myself but you pull that off real nice!! 👍😉
Lookin great Dre!
My husband has loved you 2 since before Jr. High.  We have read every book and he taught me about your lives and I appreciate and listen to your art more than I ever did before.
My hubby and I have known each other since 3rd grade.
I've always been a rock girl but he has been through some bad stuff before we became married in 2012 and he has overcome it all through your music Em.  Thank you for expressing your pain through art as that is therapy in itself as you have saved many lives!  I appreciate you and understand so much more than I did before!
